resources.string: You did great! It seems that this training intensity is challenging enough for you. Just keep going!
You set a high bar with this one! I will increase your weights to make training more challenging!
Don\'t be dosappointed. Next time i will lightly decrease the weights to improve your performance

Hi, I am Real Gym Trainer and I will be your personal gym assistant. My goal is to maximize your training performances and to encourage you for higher goals and achievements, but to do that, I\'ll need some info of you, so first, let\'s create your profile.
